description: Golden, crisp and fluffy, this roast potatoes recipe will become a family favourite. Using 3 ingredients, you'll be able to make the best roast potatoes in no time.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,Halal,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Best Roast Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2kg brushed potatoes, washed, peeled, cut into 5cm chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork.
Drain potato, then return to pan and shake over low heat to dry out and rough up sides. Toss in flour.

Coat bottom of shallow roasting pan with oil and preheat in oven for 5 minutes. Remove pan from oven and add potato, carefully tossing in oil. Season well with salt. Roast, basting with oil every 15 minutes, for 50 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.
